Cosa vuoi fare?: What do you want to do?
C'è stato un errore nella registrazione,: There was an error in the registration process, please try again later
C'è stato un problema di comunicazione c: There has been a communication problem with our server: data could be not updated

Dai un'occhiata a questo posto: Take a look of this place
Devi eseguire l'accesso per poter usufru: You must login to access this feature
Devi essere localizzato per segnalare la: You have to be geolocalized to report your location
è una piattaforma sviluppata per i tour: is a dedicated platform to create a mobile App with your travel packages: itineraries, points of interest, OpenStreetMap maps. All in offline mode.
Il codice di viaggio che hai inserito no: This travel code is not valid. Check if it is correct and try again
Inserisci un'email valida per continuare: Please enter a valid email to continue
La mappa offline occupa circa 250 MB di: Offline map needs about 250 MB of space, it is recommended to download with a Wi-Fi network (installation may take a few minutes)
La password e la conferma della password: Password and password confirmation do not match
La posizione che stai per condividere no: The coordinates you are about to share are not your current location but the position indicated by the cross in the middle of the map. To share your current location ensure to be near the map center by moving the map to you position. Do you want to share this coordinates anyway?
La richiesta è stata inviata, ti è stata: The request has been sent. We sent you an e-mail with the instuction to finish the purchase
L'email e la conferma dell'email non coi: Email and email confirmation do not match
Pagina disponibile solo online. Controll: Page only available online. Check your connection and try again
Per maggiori informazioni:: Want more info? Please contact us:
Per maggiori informazioni, visitate il n: For more information, please visit our website:
Per registrarsi è richiesto accettare le: To register is required to accept the privacy policy conditions
Premi il tasto Reset per cancellare l'at: Press the Reset button to clear the current version of the map and proceed to download the new version
Quando raggiungi l'osteria La Cantinetta: When you reach the La Cantinetta inn, show your CARD Signal Valley: you will be entitled to a 10% discount on the a la carte menu!
Questa funzionalità è disponibile solo c: This feature is only available online. Check your connection and try again
Questa funzionalità sarà disponibile dai: This feature will be available from the next updates
Questo itinerario è riservato ai clienti: This route is reserved for Verde Natura customers who have purchased this trip. Once the trial phase has ended, itineraries will be available to everyone
realizza servizi cartografici web e mobi: creates web, mobile and printed maps for Nature & Adventure Tourism.
Realizziamo mappe ed applicazioni web e: We make maps and web and mobile apps for E-Tourism and the great outdoors.
Scarica la mappa e abilita la funzione d: Download the map and enable offline navigation
Sei sicuro di voler effettuare il logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
It seems that your GPS is disabled. In order to access all the feature of this app it should be enabled. Do you want to do it now?
Sembra che tu sia fuori dai limiti della: Looks like you're out of bounds of the map
Looks like you're out of bounds of the map!
Looks like you're out of bounds of the map: the help request is not available
Si è verificato un errore di comunicazio: There has been a fatal communication problem. Check your connection and try again later
Si è verificato un errore di connessione: There was a connection error, please try again later
Si è verificato un errore durante la ric: An error occurred during the request, please try again
Si è verificato un errore nello scaricam: There was an error downloading the package, please be sure to be online and try again
There was an error downloading the package, please try again
Stai per richiedere l'accesso al downloa: You are about to request access to the download of the route, you will receive an e-amil with the instruction to buy it. Do you want to proceed?
Stai per rimuovere l'itinerario dal disp: You are about to remove the route from the device, do you want to proceed?
Stai per scaricare l'itinerario sul disp: You are about to download the route on your device, do you want to proceed?
Tutte le funzionalità legate alla tua po: All the feature based on your position are disabled. To use them change the location permission from your device settings
Voglio iscrivermi alla newsletter: I want to subscribe to the newsletter

0.title: How it works
0.html: After sign up, with a click you can request access to the route download.

1.title: Download the routes
1.html: You will be notified by adminstrators. Now with just a click you could download the routes assigned.

2.title: Navigate the map
2.html: Every route has a reference map where there are the points of interest select by us.

3.title: Open the info
3.html: By clicking on the icon you can access the descricption, the photo gallery and other info about that point of interest.

4.title: Geolocate yourself
4.html: By clicking the geolocation button you can see your position (the blu point in the map).

5.title: Direct the map
5.html: By clicking again the geolocation button you activate the compass mode and the map will rotate and orientate to Nord.
